about_the_game:
Explore the light of the stars.

This game is still in heavy development, but on release,
you will:
  • Take part in large battles of space ships.
  • Uncover the secrets of an alien race.
  • Upgrade your ship while following a deep story about two friends.
  • Earn credits by helping strangers across the universe.
  • ᔑㄩᖇᐯꙆᐯᙓ

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or 11
  • Processor: Intel i3-6100 or equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512MB
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or 11
  • Processor: Intel i5-9400 or equivalent
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1GB

short_description: Experience large space ship battles. Uncover the secrets of the mysterious alien race. Upgrade your ship or even start a fleet. Survive
